stream-view.settings.user-id.name: Stream User (required)
stream-view.settings.user-id.hint: Select the user that will display the Stream View. This user should be assigned 'Observer' permission for all player characters. Log in as this user in a browser source to stream it.
stream-view.settings.camera-mode.name: Camera Mode
stream-view.settings.camera-mode.hint: 'Automatic' camera mode will track the party, focusing on speaking tokens (in-game voice or text), and track the current combatant/targets during combat. 'Directed' mode tracks the view of the GM on the Stream View.
stream-view.settings.maximum-scale.name: Maximum Scale
stream-view.settings.maximum-scale.hint: Maximum scale when zooming in Automatic camera mode.
stream-view.settings.minimum-scale.name: Minimum Scale
stream-view.settings.minimum-scale.hint: Minimum scale when zooming in Automatic camera mode.
Duration in milliseconds for animation of camera movement in Automatic camera mode.
stream-view.settings.preview-display.hin: Displays an overlay of the stream view camera bounds on the GM view.
stream-view.settings.directed-combat.hin: If enabled, during combat the Stream View camera will follow the view of the current combatant.
stream-view.settings.show-speech-bubbles: If using in-game voice chat, a speech bubble will appear above the token of the currently speaking user.
stream-view.settings.pan-on-user-speakin: If using in-game voice chat, focus on the token(s) of recently speaking users (for GMs, the currently selected token will be used, if any).
stream-view.settings.speaker-decay.name: Speaker Decay (ms)
stream-view.settings.speaker-decay.hint: The time in milliseconds to focus a token after the user stops speaking via in-game voice chat or text.
stream-view.settings.show-full-sidebar.h: Show full sidebar on Stream View, this will disable all automatic popout handling, and so should only be enabled temporarily, if you need to access e.g. the configuration menu for the stream user. Refresh on the stream client requried.
stream-view.settings.show-chat.name: Show Chat
stream-view.settings.show-chat.hint: Show chat log on Stream View.
stream-view.settings.chat-position-x.hin: Horizontal screen position for chat log (negative numbers position from right of screen).
stream-view.settings.chat-position-y.hin: Vertical screen position for chat log (negative numbers position from bottom of screen).
stream-view.settings.auto-show-combat.hi: Show/hide combat tracker when combat starts/ends.
stream-view.settings.combat-position-x.h: Horizontal screen position for combat tracker (negative numbers position from right of screen).
stream-view.settings.combat-position-y.h: Vertical screen position for combat tracker (negative numbers position from bottom of screen).
stream-view.settings.show-voice-video.hi: Show voice/video chat on Stream View.
stream-view.settings.voice-video-size.hi: Size preset for voice/video display on Stream View.
stream-view.settings.voice-video-positio: Horizontal screen position for voice/video (negative numbers position from right of screen).
Vertical screen position for voice/video (negative numbers position from bottom of screen).
stream-view.settings.show-scene-navigati: Show scene navigation on Stream View.
stream-view.settings.show-logo.name: Show Logo
stream-view.settings.show-player-list.hi: Show player list on Stream View.
stream-view.settings.padding-left.name: Camera Padding Left
stream-view.settings.padding-left.hint: Left padding for Automatic camera view, to account for overlays, chat log, etc.
stream-view.settings.padding-right.name: Camera Padding Right
stream-view.settings.padding-right.hint: Right padding for Automatic camera view, to account for overlays, chat log, etc.
stream-view.settings.padding-top.name: Camera Padding Top
stream-view.settings.padding-top.hint: Top padding for Automatic camera view, to account for overlays, chat log, etc.
stream-view.settings.padding-bottom.name: Camera Padding Bottom
stream-view.settings.padding-bottom.hint: Bottom padding for Automatic camera view, to account for overlays, chat log, etc.
stream-view.settings.padding-combat-left: During combat, left padding for Automatic camera view, to account for combat log, overlays, chat log, etc.
stream-view.settings.padding-combat-righ: During combat, right padding for Automatic camera view, to account for combat log, overlays, chat log, etc.
During combat, top padding for Automatic camera view, to account for combat log, overlays, chat log, etc.
stream-view.settings.padding-combat-bott: During combat, bottom padding for Automatic camera view, to account for combat log, overlays, chat log, etc.
stream-view.settings.hide-popout-headers: Hide the headers on popouts (close button, etc) for Stream View.
stream-view.settings.popout-auto-close-d: Time to wait before auto-closing popouts (e.g. when sharing journals) on the Stream View, in seconds. Zero never auto-closes.
